title: Tech stocks could rise as much as 25% over 2021: Wedbush Securities
text: Secular drivers such as cloud, cybersecurity and digital transformation could lead to a "golden age" of re-rating, making this an opportunity to own tech stocks, says Daniel Ives of Wedbush Securities.

title: Facebook to reinstate political ad ban in Georgia following Senate runoff elections
text: Facebook temporarily lifted the ban on political ads in Georgia in December.

title: Big Tech in 2021: Rising Risk of Antitrust Action
text: For more than a year, the world's largest tech companies have found themselves faced with escalating levels of political risk . Calls to break them up have increasingly garnered mainstream appeal.

title: Facebook to Announce Fourth Quarter and Full Year 2020 Results
text: MENLO PARK, Calif., Jan. 5, 2021 /PRNewswire/ -- Facebook, Inc. (NASDAQ: FB) announced today that the company's fourth quarter and full year 2020 financial results will be released after market close on Wednesday, January 27, 2021. Facebook will host a conference call to discuss its...

title: Apple's upcoming iPhone privacy feature exposes Facebook and Snap to most risk compared to their peers, analysts say
text: MKM Partners analysts say some online ad companies like Facebook and Snap will be more exposed to the impacts on mobile advertising than other peers.

title: 3 Nasdaq 100 Stocks That Can Make You a Boatload of Money in 2021
text: The highflying Nasdaq 100 is hiding some serious value in plain sight.
